sentence.text: The current study aims to investigate the biological roles and clinical significance of ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway in human gastric cancer.

entity.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway

sentence.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway downregulation was found in 57 of 137 human gastric cancer samples and correlated with advanced regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase III stage, positive positive regulation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process status, and relapse.

entity.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway
regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase III
positive regulation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process

sentence.text: In conclusion, our results suggest that ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway downregulation might serve as an indicator for poor prognosis in gastric cancer patients.

entity.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway
